text: Great quality seller. Item arrived in condition as described slightly better. Battery health was at 90% so it is a good value that should last. Overall appearance was great. There was only one scratch next to the screen on the frame but I use a watch cover so it doesn‚Äôt matter

I bought one for my wife 3 years ago. This one is same and lot lot less. My only issue with apple watch has to be charged every day but very useful. I use it for checking my heart rate and I installed golf app very useful. when i‚Äôm on golf course i can answer phone or dismiss play music check weather and answer endless questions from my buddy what time is it. better than phone because i can lose phone on golf course but watch always on my hand.

I love my new watch. There was a little glue around the edges but I think I can remove that. Other than that it works great. I didn‚Äôt have the money to pay $300 for a brand new one and going from an old Series 2 to Series 7 is enough for me. I love it!!! I would order it again. üòä

This item was a replacement from a return I had to make with the seller. Initially I called the number that come with the package and didn't get very far. The seller contacted me through ebay after leaving feedback and completely 180'd my experience. New item was exactly as described. Seller communication was very prompt. They have an excellent return policy. Once we started communicating, it was the smoothest customer service experience I ever had!

Item arrived extremely quickly and was packaged securely. The items condition was immaculate, arriving in a OEM packaging with zero sign of use other than being designated as ‚ÄúAS IS+‚Äù on packaging labels, which is well within expectations for the listing. Extremely satisfied with the quality and value, highly recommended and would shop with seller again.

Item was shipped quickly and arrived well packaged. There was a small discrepancy between the item I received and the description of the item. Customer service got back to me the same day and resolved the issue within hours. Won't hesitate to buy again from this honest seller.

Second time purchasing with this seller and each time is a great experience. Item arrived quickly and condition was as described (excellent)! Great value for the item and it looked brand new. Always happy with this seller and it was shipped very quickly and arrived within three days.

I was on the clock to have this phone shipped same day by the retailer to replace my old Samsung s10. It not only shipped but I received it the next day. The seller listed it as refurbished in excellent condition. Although it came in a generic box, the phone looks brand new -not a scratch- and works perfectly. Good value. I would recommend this seller for sure.
